channel.title: Server keeps crashing cuz of a noob
channel.description:
Hi guys,
Ive got a big problem...
There is some guy, that keeps lagging my server... He does that by logging in a thousand times per second, and keeps going till server crashes..
His name when he login: SYIpkpker (and at the end, some random character..)
Does anyone has a solution for this?
Greetz, P3anutScape staff

item.title: Server keeps crashing cuz of a noob
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

its a hacker using SYIpkpker… lol its not so strange…its so famous bot -.-

Read full topic
item.source: Server keeps crashing cuz of a noob

item.title: Server keeps crashing cuz of a noob
item.dc:creator: @Icy_Inferno Icy Inferno
item.description:
@Icy_Inferno wrote:

Fail.

Add a method that automatically bans any usernames beginning with the letters syi.

Read full topic
item.source: Server keeps crashing cuz of a noob

item.title: Server keeps crashing cuz of a noob
item.dc:creator: @smfftw224 smfftw224
item.description:
@smfftw224 wrote:

That happened on my server once. I closed server then went to my source then went to his name and deleted everything on all JAVA files about him then I went onto my server as his user with a different pass.

Read full topic
item.source: Server keeps crashing cuz of a noob

item.title: Server keeps crashing cuz of a noob
item.dc:creator: @SivanScape SivanScape
item.description:
@SivanScape wrote:

Man i have every week one its not hard.

Even if the ban doesnt work then close server for a min.

1: Go connected from.
2: Find syipkpker.
3: Open it and u see the ipaddres.
4: copy it.
5: Go to data.
6: click on bannedips.
7: Paste his ip there.
8: Save it.
9: run you’re server again.
10: And hes not there anymore.
it works for me. Because sometimes
they use like characters that u dont have.

hope it helped u.

Read full topic
item.source: Server keeps crashing cuz of a noob

item.title: Server keeps crashing cuz of a noob

item.description:
@harmony524 wrote:

just ban syipkpker

cause actully that name means that he hacks through moparscape servers and stuff u better block him…

Read full topic
item.source: Server keeps crashing cuz of a noob

item.title: Server keeps crashing cuz of a noob
item.dc:creator: @skiller_noob1 skiller noob1
item.description:
@skiller_noob1 wrote:

Sorry, but you posted this in the wrong section. This should be in “Server Development/Help” They can supply you with an anit-SYI code. Most server already have this feature but you must have one of the old source or your useing Project Czar.

Read full topic
item.source: Server keeps crashing cuz of a noob

item.title: Server keeps crashing cuz of a noob
item.dc:creator: @M3dalz M3dalz
item.description:
@M3dalz wrote:

The most logical thing would make your own client and server to only take packets from that client. Also changing ports will work i belive. I hope you solve this.

Read full topic

hope this helps

item.title: Server keeps crashing cuz of a noob
item.dc:creator: @Robonator Robonator
item.description:
@Robonator wrote:

masterlop:

hmmm, he must be a hacker, we had a guy like that on voralscape, who created a new account and was suddenly lvl 123, and went and killed people outside of the wilderness.

I think he just is a wannabe hacker, that has an program, that auto login 300 times or somethinglll

He logs in with diffrent names…

SYIpkpker_a
SYIpkpker_b
SYIpkpker_c
etc…etc…

Like 60 logins per sec… Server cant handle that, and it crashes

Read full topic
